00001 // This is a simplified version of chromium's callback mechanism.
00002 // The parameters' type of callback are fixed to CppArgumentList & CppVariant
00003 
00004 #ifndef WEBKIT_GLUE_CALLBACK_H_
00005 #define WEBKIT_GLUE_CALLBACK_H_
00006 
00007 #include "CppVariant.h"
00008 
00009 namespace gaia {
00010 namespace webkit {
00011 
00012 class CppBoundClass;
00013 class CppCallbackProxy;
00014 
00015 class Callback {
00016     friend class CppBoundClass;
00017 public:
00018     Callback();
00019     virtual ~Callback();
00020     virtual void Run(CppArgumentList& args, CppVariant* result) = 0;
00021 
00022 protected:
00023     CppCallbackProxy* getProxy() const { return mpProxy; }
00024 
00025 private:
00026     CppCallbackProxy* mpProxy;
00027 };
00028 
00029 // Mehtod callback
00030 template <typename Functor, typename P1>
00031 class MCallback : public Callback {
00032 public:
00033     MCallback(Functor ptr, P1* self ) : Callback(), funcptr_(ptr), self_(self) {
00034     }
00035 
00036     void Run(CppArgumentList& args, CppVariant* result) {
00037         (self_->*funcptr_)(args, result);
00038     }
00039 
00040 private:
00041     Functor funcptr_;
00042     P1* self_;
00043 };
00044 
00045 template <typename Functor, typename P1>
00046 Callback* Bind(Functor functor, P1* p1) {
00047     return new MCallback<Functor, P1>(functor, p1);
00048 }
00049 
00050 } // namespace webkit
00051 } // namespace gaia
00052 
00053 #endif // WEBKIT_GLUE_CALLBACK_H_
